name: Boyd Rice
description: '''Boyd Blake Rice''' (born December 16, 1956) is an American experimental sound/[[noise music]]ian using the name of '''NON''' since the mid-1970s. A pioneer of [[industrial music]], he is also a writer, archivist, actor, and photographer. Rice's music and art have been influenced by fascist ideas and aesthetics, and he has often been accused of fascist sympathies as a result.
